attributes.action: Compulsory National Service For Young Offenders
attributes.additional_details: Basically any teenager who commits a crime under the age of 18 should be in circumstances which normally relates to an ASBO or more should be committed to doing a minimum of 3 years National Service When they hit 16 or over. If they reject the idea (The kids) they could face a long time in prison for cowardist like they do in Israel and Greece and numerous other countries. This will raise the respect of Youngsters and also teach them skills for life rather than other beaurocratic ways. Also this would do the Services a world of good and reduce prision convictions and crime rates there is too many PROS outwaying the CONS to not consider this
